title: Belong Together
description: Olivia knows that loving her two men isn’t conventional, but she’s determined to have them even if the whole world disapproves.  Levi and Zeke have claimed their girl, but not everyone is happy for them. There are some arrows that even the two of them can’t block. The three will have to stand strong in order to convince all that matter that the three of them belong together.
author: Ella Goode
